description: Prior approval for the erection of 20m high telecommunications pole and associated ground level equipment cabinets.
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-f5e36a22-7fff-dd80-d3b9-db9f021ecb66"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The proposed telecommunications pole and ancillary equipment, by reason of size, scale, siting and the creation of additional street clutter would comprise an overbearing and incongruous feature which detracts from the character and appearance of the streetscene, the surrounding area and would fail to preserve or enhance the character and appearance of the St. Marks Conservation Area and nearby St Marks Grade II Listed Building, contrary to policies D3 (Optimising Site Capacity through a Design Led Approach), D4 (Delivering Good Design), D8 (Public Realm)</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">&nbsp;and HC1 (Heritage Conservation and Growth) of the London Plan (2021) and policies PP1 (Public Realm), LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character),&nbsp; LP3 (Designated Heritage Assets) and LP4 (Non-designated Heritage Assets) of Hackney's LP33 (2020), St Marks Conservation Area Appraisal and the </span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">National Planning Policy Framework.</span></span><br></p>
application_type_full: Prior Approval: Development for electronic communications network
